CustomField.description: -Creative ways to improve the technologies and processes within the group organization -Keep updated and informed of the latest technology and software to enhance & ensure that the company system stays updated and relevant -Review maintenance contracts regularly for all IT equipment including desktops, laptops, servers, storage, firewalls and network devices. -Review, analyse and update IT hardware and software and upkeep of IT register. -Manage internal helpdesk support and equipment for employee on-/off-boarding -Responsible for day-to-day support and troubleshooting of all in- house software and equipment (desktops, laptops, printers)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Creative ways to improve the technologies and processes within the group organization -Keep informed of the latest technology and software to ensure that the company system stays relevant -Review contracts regularly for all IT equipment including desktops, laptops, servers, storage, firewalls and network devices. -Review, analyse and update IT hardware and software and upkeep of IT register. -Manage equipment for employee on-/off-boarding -Responsible for day-to-day support and troubleshooting
CustomField.label: Maintenance [IT]
